```{r}
# 安装并加载必要的包
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)

# 示例数据集
data <- data.frame(
  Category = rep(c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E"), each = 22),
  Subcategory = rep(paste0("Subcat", 1:22), times = 5),
  Value = sample(1:110, 110, replace = TRUE)
)

# 颜色列表（重复使用提供的颜色列表以满足20种颜色的需求）
colors <- c("#aae1e0","#2f6c81","#4a9ba7","#a3cbd6","#c0cfbd","#9bb88a","#7b9b64","#d0cab7","#c6a4c5","#9b7baa","#7a7aaf","#434d91","#5284a2","#82b4c8","#9d795d","#d1b49a","#fff08c","#e1834e","#cd6073","#ffc7c9","#969696","#d1d9e2")

# 按子类别的反序排列数据框
data$Subcategory <- factor(data$Subcategory, levels = rev(unique(data$Subcategory)))

# 反转颜色列表的顺序
colors <- rev(colors)

# 绘制堆叠柱状图
ggplot(data, aes(x = Category, y = Value, fill = Subcategory)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colors) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Stacked Bar Chart with 20 Subcategories per Category", x = "Category", y = "Value")

```

```{r}
# 安装并加载必要的包
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)

# 示例数据集
set.seed(123)  # 设置随机种子以获得可重复的结果
data <- data.frame(
  Category = rep(c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E"), each = 22),
  Subcategory = rep(paste0("Subcat", 1:22), times = 5),
  Value = sample(1:500, 110, replace = TRUE)  # 使用更大的值范围
)

# 颜色列表
colors <- c("#aae1e0","#2f6c81","#4a9ba7","#a3cbd6","#c0cfbd","#9bb88a","#7b9b64","#d0cab7","#c6a4c5","#9b7baa",
            "#7a7aaf","#434d91","#5284a2","#82b4c8","#9d795d","#d1b49a","#fff08c","#e1834e","#cd6073","#ffc7c9",
            "#969696","#d1d9e2")

# 按子类别的反序排列数据框
data$Subcategory <- factor(data$Subcategory, levels = rev(unique(data$Subcategory)))

# 反转颜色列表的顺序
colors <- rev(colors)

# 绘制堆叠柱状图
ggplot(data, aes(x = Category, y = Value, fill = Subcategory)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colors) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Stacked Bar Chart with 22 Subcategories per Category", x = "Category", y = "Value")

```
